t: Amazon China - Wikipedia
s: December 24, 2024 - Amazon China (Chinese: 亚马逊中国), formerly known as Joyo.com (Chinese: 卓越网), is an online shopping website. Joyo.com was founded in early 2000 by the Chinese entrepreneur Lei Jun in Beijing, China. The company primarily sold books and other media goods, shipping to customers nationwide.

t: Amazon partnered with China propaganda arm | Reuters
s: December 18, 2021 - Ratings and reviews are a crucial part of Amazon's e-commerce business, a major way of engaging shoppers. But Amazon complied, the two people said. Currently, on its Chinese site Amazon.cn, the government-published book has no customer reviews or any ratings.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Amazon.com, Inc., doing business as Amazon (/ˈæməzɒn/ ⓘ, AM-ə-zon; UK also /ˈæməzən/, AM-ə-zən), is an American multinational technology company engaged in e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

t: Amazon's "Significant" Reliance on Chinese Sellers - Marketplace Pulse
s: February 13, 2024 - Amazon acknowledged the Chinese seller market share on its marketplace for the first time, calling it "significant."

t: Chart: Made in China, Sold on Amazon | Statista
s: According to media reports, Amazon is now planning to launch its own low-cost offering. A presentation seen by CNBC reveals the new store will offer a range of unbranded products with prices expected to be under $20. Items cited include massage devices, fitness weights and cell phone cases.

t: Chinese Sellers Are Building Brands on Amazon - Marketplace Pulse
s: December 6, 2018 - More than ten thousand Chinese sellers are attending the 4th annual Amazon Global Store Seller Summit. Amazon's message in China is simple: innovate on great products, expand worldwide, and build brands. And it's working.

t: Amazon says it’s permanently banned 600 Chinese brands for review fraud | The Verge
s: September 17, 2021 - Following the high-profile disappearances of Aukey, Mpow, RavPower, Choetech and more, Amazon now says it’s cracked down on 3,000 seller accounts across 600 Chinese brands over the past five months.

t: Amazon, Apple most valuable brands but China’s rising - Kantar survey | Reuters
s: June 21, 2021 - Amazon (AMZN.O) and Apple (AAPL.O) are the world's most valuable brands but Chinese brands are rising up the leaders list and are more valuable than Europe's top brands, according to a global ranking by Kantar’s BrandZ.

t: Why is Amazon full of made in China products? This is annoying. Why didn't Amazon create a made in the USA filter? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): Bought an item on Amazon, got tracking the next day saying “shipped from Jamaica NY.” A week later, no tracking update, I’m in Mass., a delivery from NY would have updated in that time. Found out later after sending 3 messages to the seller that the seller is in China, ...

t: Chinese electronics company Anker starts raising prices on Amazon | Reuters
s: April 11, 2025 - At least 100 Anker products have seen an average increase of 18% since Thursday last week, with the majority of those occurring after Trump added an extra 50% import duty on Chinese goods, according to data.
